dcterms:creator: V. Mnih
K. Kavukcuoglu
D. Silver
A. Rusu
J. Veness
M. Bellemare
A. Graves
dcterms:description: Cart-Pole is the classical reinforcement learning problem where the aim is to balance the pole upright on the cart by moving the cart left or right. State is represented by a list of observations [cart position, cart velocity, pole angle, pole velocity at the tip].
dcterms:title: OpenAI Gym CartPole

dcterms:creator: T. Lillicrap
J. Hunt
A. Pritzel
N. Heess
dcterms:description: BipedalWalker is a robot with a LIDAR system and two legs having four joints, two in each leg. The goal is to train the robot to walk as fast as possible on the simple terrain (with no obstacles).
dcterms:title: OpenAI Gym BipedalWalker-v3
